content: पशुः [सर्वमविशेषेण पश्यति, दृश्-कु पशादेशः] {@--1@} Cattle (both singly and collectively); <ls>Ms. 9. 327</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 9.">331.</ls> {@--2@} An animal in general. {@--3@} A sacrificial animal, such as a goat; an oblation, a victim. {@--4@} A brute, beast; often added to words meaning ‘man’ to show contempt; पुरुषपशोश्च पशोश्च को विशेषः <ls>H. 1</ls>; <ab>cf.</ab> नृपशु, नरपशु &c. {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of a subordinate deity and one of Śiva's followers. {@--6@} An uninitiated person. {@--7@} The soul, the Supreme spirit. {@--8@} A sacrifice in which an animal is killed. {@--9@} Fire.
